timeline.message:
Migrate to OpenAPI 3 annotations

* Upgrade to Swagger 2.1.0
* Add missing root and events resources
* Fix wrong and add missing response implementations

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

timeline.bodyText: Thanks for fixing the response class 😊 I've been meaning to take care of it, but 🤷
timeline.author: ghys

replies.bodyText: These copy/paste errors and wrong responses probably only become a major issue when using the spec with codegen for generating your own model classes. I think most users wouldn't really notice if they only use the Swagger UI for exploring the API. :-)
replies.author: wborn
